title: Cressi 7mm Inox Shaft for Comanche, Pacific & Geronimo Elite
features: Capable of holding 1-2 bands per tab
description: Finned, flopper style 7mm spear shaft. Spear shafts are made with spring stainless steel, heat treated to increase hardness and prevent bending. The original Cressi shark-fin tabs have a smooth finish capable of holding 1 or 2 bands per tab.
